treasury_media.title: 1st Miriam Balaban Outstanding Publication award (25 May 2023)
treasury_media.description:
The jury of the European Desalination Conference 2023 selected my publication entitled "Aspects of environmental impacts of seawater desalination: Cyprus as a case study"for the first Miriam Balaban outstanding publication award. It is a great honor and recognition of my work, I am very thankful to the EDS for this award, as well as to the co-authors of this work for their great collaboration!

We will certainly work further building on this outstanding results!

treasury_media.title: Circular Desalination: Value Chains & Sustainability
treasury_media.description: This workshop I organized and moderated within the European Desalination Society 2023 conference in Limassol, Cyprus on 22 May 2023. It attracted the interest of more than 100 participants and I had the pleasure to host more than 23 panelists and speakers, shaping together the transition from linear desalination socio-technical systems to carbon-neutral and circular ones. We explored how the WATER-MINING results can be used for social embedding of this novel solution for the context of Cyprus!

projects.title: SOL-BRINE
projects.description:
SOL-BRINE is a Life + Environmental Policy and Governance Project co-funded by the European Community. The duration of the project is 39 months (Start date: 01/10/2010 - End date: 31/12/2013). The project is implemented in Tinos, Greece under the coordination of the municipality of Tinos and the cooperation of the associated beneficiaries National Technical University of Athens and Culligan Hellas SA.

The project aims at developing an energy autonomous brine treatment system for total elimination of brine, according to Zero Liquid Discharge principle (ZLD), being produced from Tinos seawater desalination plant. The project will result to high water recovery (>90%) and production of dry salt with market prospects, adding one more valuable output to the entire system.

The implementation of the project involves the design, development, testing, demonstration, optimization and evaluation of a pilot scale brine treatment system, contributing significantly to the development of full-scale brine elimination systems.
